Title: Shanghai Triad (Yao a yao yao dao waipo qiao)

text: #374. Shanghai Triad (1995): A slow burn crime thriller from Zhang Yimou that unfolds in a really interesting way. Seems like a lot of things are happening beneath the serene surface. Look forward to revisiting #ShanghaiTriad #2021FilmDiary #FilmTwitter https://t.co/7fJq0UkCPm
